mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_BS_NORMAL_DOC ( DOC_ID, DOC_NAME, DOC_TYPE, DOC_CODE, FILE_ID, STATUS, REMARK, DOC_VERSION, CREATED_DATE, CREATED_BY ) VALUES ( #{docId}, #{docName}, #{docType}, #{docCode}, #{fileId}, 1, #{remark}, 1, sysdate, #{createdBy} )
mapper.update: update T_BS_NORMAL_DOC DOC_NAME = #{docName}, DOC_TYPE = #{docType}, DOC_CODE = #{docCode}, FILE_ID = #{fileId}, STATUS = #{status}, REMARK = #{remark}, DOC_VERSION = #{docVersion}, CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate}, CREATED_BY = #{createdBy}, UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate}, UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy}, where doc_id = #{docId}
mapper.select: select count(*) from T_BS_NORMAL_DOC where DOC_NAME = #{docName} or DOC_CODE = #{docCode}
select count(*) from T_BS_BIZ_DOC where DOC_ID != #{docId} and DOC_NAME = #{docName} and DOC_CODE = #{docCode}
select * from T_BS_NORMAL_DOC and DOC_NAME like '%${docName}%' and STATUS = #{status} order by CREATED_DATE desc
mapper.update: update T_BS_NORMAL_DOC set STATUS = #{status} where DOC_ID = #{docId} or doc_code = #{docId}
mapper.select: select count(*) from T_BS_NORMAL_DOC where DOC_NAME = #{docName} or DOC_CODE = #{docCode}
